      • isTopSolid

        public boolean isTopSolid​(IBlockState state)
        已过时。
        prefer calling IBlockProperties.isTopSolid() wherever possible
        Determines if the block is solid enough on the top side to support other blocks, like redstone components.
        覆盖:
        isTopSolid 在类中 Block

      • getBlockFaceShape

        public BlockFaceShape getBlockFaceShape​(IBlockAccess worldIn,
                                        IBlockState state,
                                        BlockPos pos,
                                        EnumFacing face)
        已过时。
        call via IBlockProperties.getBlockFaceShape(IBlockAccess,BlockPos,EnumFacing) whenever possible. Implementing/overriding is fine.
        Get the geometry of the queried face at the given position and state. This is used to decide whether things like buttons are allowed to be placed on the face, or how glass panes connect to the face, among other things.

        Common values are SOLID, which is the default, and UNDEFINED, which represents something that does not fit the other descriptions and will generally cause other things not to connect to the face.

        覆盖:
        getBlockFaceShape 在类中 Block
        返回:
        an approximation of the form of the given face

      • isOpaqueCube

        public boolean isOpaqueCube​(IBlockState state)
        已过时。
        call via IBlockProperties.isOpaqueCube() whenever possible. Implementing/overriding is fine.
        Used to determine ambient occlusion and culling when rebuilding chunks for render
        覆盖:
        isOpaqueCube 在类中 Block

      • doesSideBlockRendering

        public boolean doesSideBlockRendering​(IBlockState state,
                                      IBlockAccess world,
                                      BlockPos pos,
                                      EnumFacing face)
        从类复制的说明: Block
        Check if the face of a block should block rendering. Faces which are fully opaque should return true, faces with transparency or faces which do not span the full size of the block should return false.
        覆盖:
        doesSideBlockRendering 在类中 Block
        参数:
        state - The current block state
        world - The current world
        pos - Block position in world
        face - The side to check
        返回:
        True if the block is opaque on the specified side.
